content:
Hi Joanne.
I would like to take the renovation package. Here some of my queries:

1. Which date you are free for the VP Handover? 
2. Your side will assist with the defect inspection right? And send me at least 1 set of keys?
3. Estimate how long the renovation will take ?
4. For the payment term, I would like request for 30% - 40% (halfway) - 30% (completion), is this workable ?

Correct grammar above.
